Package processing.sound

Class TriOsc

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.sound.TriOsc

  • public class TriOsc
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simple Triangle Wave Oscillator

      • freq

        public void freq​(float freq)
        Set the frequency of the oscillator in Hz.
        Parameters:
        freq - A floating point value of the oscillator in Hz.

      • play

      • set

        public void set​(float freq,
                float amp,
                float add,
                float pos)
        Set multiple parameters at once
        Parameters:
        freq - The frequency value of the oscillator in Hz.
        amp - The amplitude of the oscillator as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
        add - A value for modulating other audio signals.
        pos - The panoramic position of the oscillator as a float from -1.0 to 1.0.

      • add

        public void add​(float add)
        Offset the output of this generator by given value
        Parameters:
        add - A value for offsetting the audio signal.

      • amp

        public void amp​(float amp)
        Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.
        Parameters:
        amp - A float value between 0.0 (complete silence) and 1.0 (full volume) controlling the amplitude/volume of this sound.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying​()
        Check if this sound object is currently playing.
        Returns:
        `true` if this sound object is currently playing, `false` if it is not.

      • pan

        public final void pan​(float pos)
        Move the sound in a stereo panorama.
        Parameters:
        pos - The panoramic position of this sound unit as a float from -1.0 (left) to 1.0 (right).

      • stop

        public void stop​()
        Stop the generator
